text: Getty'They feel like their family is complete,'the source adds. Kate always hoped for a fourth baby to complete their family - especially now that her sister Pippa is set to give birth to her first child and Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are preparing to welcome twins - but wasn't'intending to get pregnant so soon after giving birth ', explains the royal insider, adding that she and William are taking it in their stride.'This wasn't part of their plan, but their both so excited.'The exciting news is made even better by the fact that sister - in - law Meghan Markle is already expecting her first child.'Meghan conceived just a few weeks after Kate,'a royal source told In Touch, and claims that because Meghan is having multiples,
